algorithm_technique: Union-Find with greedy edge selection, prioritizing type 3 edges.
problem_summary_simple: Remove the maximum number of edges from a graph while ensuring it remains fully traversable by both Alice and Bob.
problem_summary_technical: Utilize Union-Find to track connected components for Alice and Bob separately, prioritizing type 3 edges for maximum connectivity.
key_insights: Type 3 edges are most valuable as they benefit both Alice and Bob.
Process type 3 edges first to maximize shared connectivity.
If after processing all edges, both Alice and Bob cannot traverse the entire graph, return -1.
